name: Hotel Seagull
description: Hotel Seagull is a luxurious hotel located on the beachfront of Cox's Bazar. It offers stunning ocean views and top-notch amenities for guests.

name: Hotel Sea Crown
description: Hotel Sea Crown is a budget-friendly hotel located just a few minutes' walk from the beach in Cox's Bazar. It offers comfortable rooms and friendly service.

name: Long Beach Hotel
description: Long Beach Hotel is a 5-star hotel located on the beachfront of Cox's Bazar. It offers luxurious rooms, multiple restaurants, and a rooftop pool with ocean views.

name: Hotel The Cox Today
description: Hotel The Cox Today is a 4-star hotel located near the beach in Cox's Bazar. It offers comfortable rooms and a rooftop restaurant with ocean views.

name: Hotel Mishuk
description: Hotel Mishuk is a budget-friendly hotel located near the beach in Cox's Bazar. It offers comfortable rooms and easy access to local attractions.

address.street: Plot # 5, Block C, Sea Beach Road

name: Sundarban Tiger Camp
description: Sundarban Tiger Camp is a wilderness resort located in the heart of Sundarban National Park. It offers a unique experience of staying in a jungle and observing the wildlife in their natural habitat.

name: Sundarban Gateway Resort
description: Sundarban Gateway Resort is a luxurious resort located on the bank of Pirkhali River. It offers premium amenities and services for a comfortable and relaxing stay in the Sundarbans.

name: Sundarban Mangrove Retreat
description: Sundarban Mangrove Retreat is a unique eco-resort located in the heart of Sundarbans. It offers a peaceful and serene environment with minimal impact on the natural habitat.

name: Grand Sultan Tea Resort & Golf
description: Grand Sultan Tea Resort & Golf is a luxurious resort located amidst tea gardens in Srimangal. It offers top-notch amenities, including a golf course, spa, and multiple dining options.

name: Tea Heaven Resort
description: Tea Heaven Resort is a charming resort located in the heart of Srimangal's tea garden. It offers comfortable rooms, a restaurant serving local cuisine, and a peaceful environment.

name: Pan Pacific Sonargaon Dhaka
description: Pan Pacific Sonargaon Dhaka is a luxurious hotel located in the heart of the city. It offers spacious rooms, multiple restaurants, and top-notch amenities for guests.

name: Hotel Bengal Canary Park
description: Hotel Bengal Canary Park is a budget-friendly hotel located in the commercial area of Dhaka. It offers comfortable rooms and easy access to local attractions.
